short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Default search extension dedicated to sports lovers who constantly search for updates on game scores

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
After this default search extension is added to the browser, sports fans can easily search for their favorite sports teams and have quick access to their latest game scores directly from the default search bar of the browser.

Learn more: https://sports-search.today/
